org.jerkar.api.tooling

Class JkPom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.tooling.JkPom

  • public final class JkPom
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps a POM file (Ideally an effective POM file) and provides convenient methods to extract information from.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String artifactId()
      The artifzctId for this POM.
      JkDependencies dependencies()
      The dependencies declared in this POM.
      JkDependencyExclusions dependencyExclusion()
      The JkDependencyExclusions instance provided by the dependencyManagement section of this POM.
      java.lang.String groupId()
      The groupId for this POM.
      java.lang.String jerkarSourceCode()
      The Jerkar build class source equivalent to this POM.
      static JkPom of(java.io.File file)
      Creates a JkPom from a POM file, ideally an effective POM file.
      JkRepos repos()
      Repositories declared in this POM.
      java.lang.String version()
      The version for this POM.
      JkVersionProvider versionProvider()
      The map groupId:ArtifactId -> version provideded by the dependencyManagement section of this POM.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
